text: From the Hip is a 1987 American comedy-drama movie directed by Bob Clark and starring Judd Nelson, Elizabeth Perkins, John Hurt, Ray Walston, Darren McGavin, Richard Zobel, Allan Arbus, Dan Monahan. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1987 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Bob Clark Category:Movies set in North Carolina
title: From the Hip (movie)
